name: Bullet Placement
description:
Bullet Placement

A bullet hell game where you place the turrets

One hit from a bullet you restart

WASD to move

ARROW keys to move

R to restart

Esc to quit

Plan for the future:

1, Start pause and death menu

2, Animations for shooting and placing turrets

3, The ability for the player to choose which turret it placed

4, The more time spent alive the more points you get, which can then be spent on more turrets, the more turrets in a level the more points gained per second(s)

Made With Godot Engine
